TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed WritingProgressChangeLevel extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the scope of a event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The WritingProgressChangeLevel enumeration is used to specify <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.WritingLevel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs> class.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangeLevel FixedDocumentSequenceWritingProgress = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The output progress of a multiple document sequence.

Docs.summary: The output progress of a single document.

Docs.summary: The output progress of a single page.
